## Detection of blood sugar level in diabetes diagnosis
#### Do you want to check your blood sugar levels?

### Purposes
- Figure out what factors could affect the blood sugar of diabetics.
- Compare out what algorithm works the best in prediction blood sugar problem of diabetic.
- Find out what method we could use to collect patient blood sugar.

### Who can use?
The patient who has diabetes or anyone who wants test their own blood sugar.
